actions.text: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Green, Gene.
On agreeing to the Green, Gene amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

description: Amendment provides a five year phase-in of flood insurance premiums for low-income homeowners or renters whose primary residence is placed within a flood plain through an updating of the flood insurance program maps.
purpose: An amendment numbered 10 printed in Part B of House Report 110-351 to provide a five year phase-in of flood insurance premiums for low-income homeowners or renters whose primary residence is placed within a flood plain through an updating of the flood insurance program maps if the value of the home does not exceed 75% of the state median home value.
